sentences.en: a flat overlooking Hyde Park
sentences.cn: 一套可以俯瞰海德公园的公寓

sentences.en: a line of parked cars
sentences.cn: 一排停放着的汽车

sentences.en: a park bench
sentences.cn: 公园长椅

sentences.en: Chris was also the best player on the park.
sentences.cn: 克里斯同时也是场上的最佳球员。

sentences.en: He decided to cut across the Heath, through Greenwich Park.
sentences.cn: 他决定抄近路走格林尼治公园穿过希思区。

sentences.en: He noticed a new building going up near Whitaker Park.
sentences.cn: 他注意到惠特克公园附近正在兴建一幢新楼。

sentences.en: He staggered on the uneven surface of the car park.
sentences.cn: 他摇摇晃晃地行走在停车场凹凸不平的地面上。

sentences.en: He walked across the park and through a gateway.
sentences.cn: 他穿过公园，走过一道大门。

sentences.en: He would always be haunted by that scene in Well Park.
sentences.cn: 他永远无法摆脱威尔公园里的那一幕。

sentences.en: He's going to be the MD of the Park Lane company.
sentences.cn: 他即将出任柏宁公司的总经理。

sentences.en: He's not exactly homeless, he just hangs out in this park.
sentences.cn: 确切来说他并不算是无家可归，他只是老在这个公园里转悠。

sentences.en: Helicopters with searchlights swept the park which was sealed off.
sentences.cn: 直升飞机的探照灯来回扫射这个被封锁的公园。

sentences.en: I couldn’t find anywhere to park.
sentences.cn: 我找不到地方停车。

sentences.en: I took the kids for a picnic in the park after school.
sentences.cn: 放学后我带孩子们去公园野餐。

sentences.en: Let’s go for a walk in the park.
sentences.cn: 我们去公园散步吧。

sentences.en: She parked the car on the drive.
sentences.cn: 她把车停在了私人车道上。

sentences.en: The car park was absolutely packed solid with people.
sentences.cn: 停车场被人挤得水泄不通。

sentences.en: The city will tear down the building and create a park.
sentences.cn: 该市将拆掉这幢大楼，在这儿建个公园。

sentences.en: The park was created to preserve some of the forests upstate.
sentences.cn: 这个公园是为了保护该州最北部地区的一些森林而建的。

sentences.en: The police, raining blows on rioters and spectators alike, cleared the park.
sentences.cn: 警察不分闹事者与观众统统一顿猛击，把人们清除出了足球场。

sentences.en: This juxtaposition of brutal reality and lyrical beauty runs through Park's stories.
sentences.cn: 这种残忍的现实和浪漫美好事物的并存始终贯穿于帕克的短篇小说中。

sentences.en: You can’t park here - it’s private property.
sentences.cn: 不能把车停在这里——这是私人宅邸。

words.tran_cn: 驾车专用道路；[建] 公园道路

phrases.tran_cn: 中央公园（位于美国纽约）
中山公园（以孙中山命名的公园的总称）

trans.tran_en: a large open area with grass and trees, especially in a town, where people can walk, play games etc
a large open area with grass and trees, especially in a town, where people can walk, play games etc
to put a car or other vehicle in a particular place for a period of time
to put a car or other vehicle in a particular place for a period of time
